CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(CreatedDate), 'Unknown', IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-6),'<6 Months', IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-12),'6 Months - 1 Year', IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-60),'1-5 Years',IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-120),'5-10 Years', '10 + Years')))))
CustomField.label: Contact Age
